update PUBGJJ.FROPERACCNT
XGYHZH1 = #{xgyhzh1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PUBGJJ.FROPERACCNT set XGYHZH1 = #{xgyhzh1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGYHZH2 = #{xgyhzh2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHDLMM = #{yhdlmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WT2WT = #{wt2wt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROANO = #{froano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREALIMIT = #{arealimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCZYHZH = #{kczyhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFKXG = #{sfkxg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHCZQDID = #{zhczqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHCZRZH = #{zhczrzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHCZRXM = #{zhczrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHCZRQ = #{zhczrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YHLBDM = #{yhlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSYWWD = #{ssywwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHDLZH1 = #{yhdlzh1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHDLZH2 = #{yhdlzh2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHEMAIL = #{yhemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQHM = #{qqhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WXHM = #{wxhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WBHM = #{wbhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MMYZFS = #{mmyzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFYXXGMM = #{sfyxxgmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WT1WT = #{wt1wt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WT1DA = #{wt1da,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WT2DA = #{wt2da,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHUKEY = #{yhukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFYXDL = #{sfyxdl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZHYXQ = #{zhyxq,jdbcType=DATE}, YHGH = #{yhgh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHXM = #{yhxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHLXDH = #{yhlxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHSJHM = #{yhsjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHSR = #{yhsr,jdbcType=DATE}, YHGRAH = #{yhgrah,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHZW = #{yhzw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHJTDZ = #{yhjtdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSBM = #{ssbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHZT = #{yhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHZCRQ = #{yhzcrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YHTYRQ = #{yhtyrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YHXHRQ = #{yhxhrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YHSJSSQY = #{yhsjssqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where FROAID = #{froaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select f.yhxm,f.yhdlzh1,f.yhsjhm,f.yhdlmm,f.froaid from froperaccnt f
and f.yhxm like '%'||#{yhxm}||'%'
and f.yhlbdm = #{yhlbdm}
order by f.froaid asc
SELECT a.qdid,a.qdmc,#{froaid} froaid,b.dqzt FROM Froperqdxxb a left join (SELECT * FROM FROPERYHQDGXB WHERE FROAID=#{froaid} and DQZT='Y') b on a.QDID=b.QDID
mapper.update: UPDATE FROPERYHQDGXB SET DQZT=#{newDqzt} WHERE FROAID=#{froaid} and QDID=#{qdid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FROPERYHQDGXB(YWLSH,FROAID,QDID,DQZT,KTCZQDID,KTCZRZH,KTCZRXM,KTRQ) VALUES ( get_sequence('NEWWORKID'), #{froaid}, #{qdid}, #{newDqzt}, 'QD000', null, null, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE FROPERACCNT SET WXHM = NULL WHERE FROAID=#{froaid}
